verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> The burden נִֽינְוֵ֑ה <WH5210> of Nineveh סֵ֧פֶר <WH5612> The book חֲז֛וֹן <WH2377> of the vision נַח֖וּם <WH5151> of Nahum הָאֶלְקֹשִֽׁי׃ <WH512> the Elkoshite

אֵ֣ל <WH410> God קַנּ֤וֹא <WH7072> [is] jealous וְנֹקֵם֙ <WH5358> revengeth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God נֹקֵ֥ם <WH5358> revengeth יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God וּבַ֣עַל <WH1167> archer חֵמָ֑ה <WH2534> wrath נֹקֵ֤ם <WH5358> will take vengeance יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God לְצָרָ֔יו <WH6862> on his adversaries וְנוֹטֵ֥ר <WH5201> and he reserveth ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לְאֹיְבָֽיו׃ <WH341> [wrath] for his enemies

יְהֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶ֤רֶךְ <WH750> [is] slow אַפַּ֙יִם֙ <WH639> to anger [וּגְדֹול־ כ] (וּגְדָל־ <WH1419> and great כֹּ֔חַ <WH1419> and great ק) וְנַקֵּ֖ה <WH5352> and will not at all לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יְנַקֶּ֑ה <WH5352> acquit יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> [the wicked] the LORD בְּסוּפָ֤ה <WH5492> in the whirlwind וּבִשְׂעָרָה֙ <WH8183> and in the storm דַּרְכּ֔וֹ <WH1870> hath his way וְעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> and the clouds אֲבַ֥ק <WH80> [are] the dust רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> of his feet

גּוֹעֵ֤ר <WH1605> He rebuketh בַּיָּם֙ <WH3220> the sea וַֽיַּבְּשֵׁ֔הוּ <WH3001> and drieth up וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַנְּהָר֖וֹת <WH5104> all the rivers הֶֽחֱרִ֑יב <WH2717> and maketh it dry אֻמְלַ֤ל <WH536> weak בָּשָׁן֙ <WH1316> Bashan וְכַרְמֶ֔ל <WH3760> and Carmel וּפֶ֥רַח <WH6525> and the flower לְבָנ֖וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon אֻמְלָֽל׃ <WH536> weak

הָרִים֙ <WH2022> The mountains רָעֲשׁ֣וּ <WH7493> quake מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> because וְהַגְּבָע֖וֹת <WH1389> at him and the hills הִתְמֹגָ֑גוּ <WH4127> melt וַתִּשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> is burned הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> and the earth מִפָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> at his presence וְתֵבֵ֖ל <WH8398> yea the world וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <WH3427> and all that dwell בָֽהּ׃

לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before זַעְמוֹ֙ <WH2195> angry מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יַֽעֲמ֔וֹד <WH5975> Who can stand וּמִ֥י <WH4310> Who יָק֖וּם <WH6965> endure בַּחֲר֣וֹן <WH2740> in the fierceness אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> anger חֲמָתוֹ֙ <WH2534> anger נִתְּכָ֣ה <WH5413> is poured out כָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> like fire וְהַצֻּרִ֖ים <WH6697> and the rocks נִתְּצ֥וּ <WH5422> are thrown down מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at

ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [is] good יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD לְמָע֖וֹז <WH4581> a strong hold בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day צָרָ֑ה <WH6869> of trouble וְיֹדֵ֖עַ <WH3045> and he knoweth חֹ֥סֵי <WH2620> them that trust בֽוֹ׃

וּבְשֶׁ֣טֶף <WH7858> flood עֹבֵ֔ר <WH5674> But with an overrunning כָּלָ֖ה <WH3617> an utter end יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> he will make מְקוֹמָ֑הּ <WH4725> of the place וְאֹיְבָ֖יו <WH341> his enemies יְרַדֶּף־ <WH7291> shall pursue חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> thereof and darkness

מַה־ <WH4100> Whatever תְּחַשְּׁבוּן֙ <WH2803> What do ye imagine אֶל־ <WH413> against יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כָּלָ֖ה <WH3617> an utter end ה֣וּא <WH1931> He עֹשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> will make לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not תָק֥וּם <WH6965> shall not rise up פַּעֲמַ֖יִם <WH6471> the second time צָרָֽה׃ <WH6869> affliction

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for עַד־ <WH5704> Like סִירִ֣ים <WH5518> [as] thorns סְבֻכִ֔ים <WH5440> For while [they be] folden together וּכְסָבְאָ֖ם <WH5435> [as] drunkards סְבוּאִ֑ים <WH5433> and while they are drunken אֻ֨כְּל֔וּ <WH398> they shall be devoured כְּקַ֥שׁ <WH7179> as stubble יָבֵ֖שׁ <WH3002> dry מָלֵֽא׃ <WH4390> accomplish

מִמֵּ֣ךְ <WH4480> at יָצָ֔א <WH3318> There is [one] come out חֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH2803> of thee that imagineth עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> against the LORD רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> evil יֹעֵ֖ץ <WH3289> counsellor בְּלִיָּֽעַל׃ <WH1100> a wicked ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אִם־ <WH518> Though שְׁלֵמִים֙ <WH8003> Though [they be] quiet וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> and likewise רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> and likewise many וְכֵ֥ן <WH3651> so נָגֹ֖זּוּ <WH1494> yet thus shall they be cut down וְעָבָ֑ר <WH5674> when he shall pass through וְעִ֨נִּתִ֔ךְ <WH6031> Though I have afflicted לֹ֥א <WH3808> no אֲעַנֵּ֖ךְ <WH6031> thee I will afflict עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> longer
וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now אֶשְׁבֹּ֥ר <WH7665> For now will I break מֹטֵ֖הוּ <WH4132> his yoke מֵֽעָלָ֑יִךְ <WH5921> and וּמוֹסְרֹתַ֖יִךְ <WH4147> thy bonds אֲנַתֵּֽק׃ <WH5423> in sunder

וְצִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> hath given a commandment עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> concerning יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will no יִזָּרַ֥ע <WH2232> be sown מִשִּׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> concerning thee [that] no more of thy name ע֑וֹד <WH5750> longer מִבֵּ֨ית <WH1004> out of the house אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> of thy gods אַכְרִ֨ית <WH3772> will I cut off פֶּ֧סֶל <WH6459> the graven image וּמַסֵּכָ֛ה <WH4541> and the molten image אָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> I will make קִבְרֶ֖ךָ <WH6913> thy grave כִּ֥י <WH3588> for קַלּֽוֹתָ׃ <WH7043> for thou art vile פ

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold עַל־ <WH5921> on הֶהָרִ֜ים <WH2022> Behold upon the mountains רַגְלֵ֤י <WH7272> the feet מְבַשֵּׂר֙ <WH1319> of him that bringeth good tidings מַשְׁמִ֣יעַ <WH8085> that publisheth שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> peace חָגִּ֧י <WH2287> keep יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> O Judah חַגַּ֖יִךְ <WH2282> thy solemn feasts שַׁלְּמִ֣י <WH7999> perform נְדָרָ֑יִךְ <WH5088> thy vows כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לֹ֨א <WH3808> not יוֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> shall no more ע֛וֹד <WH5750> again [לַעֲבֹור־ כ] (לַֽעֲבָר־ <WH5674> pass בָּ֥ךְ <WH5674> pass through ק) בְּלִיַּ֖עַל <WH1100> for the wicked כֻּלֹּ֥ה <WH3605> completely נִכְרָֽת׃ <WH3772> thee he is utterly cut off
